metrics.name: system.cpu.time
metrics.description: Total seconds each logical CPU spent on each mode.

metrics.name: system.network.io
metrics.description: The number of bytes transmitted and received.

metrics.name: system.disk.io_time
metrics.description: Time disk spent activated. On Windows, this is calculated as the inverse of disk idle time.

metrics.name: system.disk.merged
metrics.description: The number of disk reads/writes merged into single physical disk access operations.

metrics.name: system.disk.pending_operations
metrics.description: The queue size of pending I/O operations.

metrics.name: system.disk.weighted_io_time
metrics.description: Time disk spent activated multiplied by the queue length.

metrics.name: k8s.node.cpu.time
metrics.description: Total cumulative CPU time (sum of all cores) spent by the container/pod/node since its creation

metrics.name: k8s.node.cpu.usage
metrics.description: Total CPU usage (sum of all cores per second) averaged over the sample window

metrics.name: k8s.node.uptime
metrics.description: The time since the node started

metrics.name: k8s.pod.cpu.time
metrics.description: Total cumulative CPU time (sum of all cores) spent by the container/pod/node since its creation

metrics.name: container.uptime

metrics.name: k8s.volume.available
metrics.description: The number of available bytes in the volume.

metrics.name: k8s.volume.capacity
metrics.description: The total capacity in bytes of the volume.

metrics.name: k8s.volume.inodes
metrics.description: The total inodes in the filesystem.

metrics.name: k8s.volume.inodes.free
metrics.description: The free inodes in the filesystem.

metrics.name: k8s.volume.inodes.used
metrics.description: The inodes used by the filesystem. This may not equal inodes - free because filesystem may share inodes with other filesystems.

metrics.name: k8s.pod.cpu.time
metrics.description: Total cumulative CPU time (sum of all cores) spent by the container/pod/node since its creation

metrics.name: k8s.pod.cpu.usage
metrics.description: Total CPU usage (sum of all cores per second) averaged over the sample window

metrics.name: k8s.pod.cpu_request_utilization
metrics.description: Pod cpu utilization as a ratio of the pod's total container requests. If any container is missing a request the metric is not emitted.

metrics.name: k8s.pod.memory_request_utilization
metrics.description: Pod memory utilization as a ratio of the pod's total container requests. If any container is missing a request the metric is not emitted.

metrics.name: container.uptime
metrics.description: The time since the container started

metrics.name: system.cpu.time
metrics.description: Total seconds each logical CPU spent on each mode.

metrics.name: system.network.io
metrics.description: The number of bytes transmitted and received.

metrics.name: system.disk.io_time
metrics.description: Time disk spent activated. On Windows, this is calculated as the inverse of disk idle time.

metrics.name: system.disk.merged
metrics.description: The number of disk reads/writes merged into single physical disk access operations.

metrics.name: system.disk.pending_operations
metrics.description: The queue size of pending I/O operations.

metrics.name: system.disk.weighted_io_time
metrics.description: Time disk spent activated multiplied by the queue length.

metrics.name: k8s.node.cpu.time
metrics.description: Total cumulative CPU time (sum of all cores) spent by the container/pod/node since its creation

metrics.name: k8s.node.cpu.usage
metrics.description: Total CPU usage (sum of all cores per second) averaged over the sample window

metrics.name: k8s.node.uptime
metrics.description: The time since the node started

metrics.name: k8s.pod.cpu.time
metrics.description: Total cumulative CPU time (sum of all cores) spent by the container/pod/node since its creation

metrics.name: k8s.pod.cpu.usage
metrics.description: Total CPU usage (sum of all cores per second) averaged over the sample window

metrics.name: k8s.pod.cpu_request_utilization
metrics.description: Pod cpu utilization as a ratio of the pod's total container requests. If any container is missing a request the metric is not emitted.

metrics.name: k8s.pod.uptime
metrics.description: The time since the pod started

metrics.name: k8s.volume.available
metrics.description: The number of available bytes in the volume.

metrics.name: k8s.volume.capacity
metrics.description: The total capacity in bytes of the volume.

metrics.name: k8s.volume.inodes
metrics.description: The total inodes in the filesystem.

metrics.name: k8s.volume.inodes.free
metrics.description: The free inodes in the filesystem.

metrics.name: k8s.volume.inodes.used
metrics.description: The inodes used by the filesystem. This may not equal inodes - free because filesystem may share inodes with other filesystems.
